title: Calories in Microwave Popcorn
meta_description: Get calories in microwave popcorn per 100g, plus carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and tweaks for plain vs. butter varieties to fit your diet.
assumptions: Butter-flavored, popped, made with palm oil; standard commercial brand like Orville Redenbacher's.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, flavor, oil type, popping completeness, and serving size. Check package labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: 100g of butter microwave popcorn has ~535 kcal, mostly from fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a bag of microwave popcorn?
faqs.a: A typical 100g bag (popped) has about 535 kcal for butter flavor; plain is lower at ~300-400 kcal.

faqs.q: Is microwave popcorn high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, butter varieties have ~35g fat per 100g, mostly saturated from palm oil.

faqs.q: What's the protein in microwave popcorn?
faqs.a: About 7g protein per 100g, making it a low-protein snack.
Yes, around 9g dietary fiber per 100g from the corn kernels.

faqs.q: How does sodium in microwave popcorn compare?
faqs.a: High at ~800mg per 100g; opt for low-sodium versions to reduce intake.
